name: ineritedprocessmigration
description: Supports migration/import/export of inherited processes from Azure DevOps Service Organisations
author: naked Agility Limited - Martin Hinshelwood

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Migration execution type: migrate / import / export

inputs.name: sourceAccount
inputs.label: Source Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source account endpoint. Required in export/migrate mode, ignored in import mode.

inputs.name: sourceProcessName
inputs.label: Source Process Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source process name to export. Required in export/migrate mode, ignored in import mode.

inputs.name: targetAccount
inputs.label: Target Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target account endpoint. Required in import/migrate mode, ignored in export mode.

inputs.name: targetProcessName
inputs.label: Target Process Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target process name to export. Required in import/migrate mode, ignored in import mode.

inputs.name: processFilename
inputs.label: Process Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: File with process payload. Required in import mode, optional for export/migrate mode.

inputs.name: logLevel
inputs.label: Log Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, log level for console. Possibe values are 'Verbose'/'Information'/'Warning'/'Error'.

inputs.name: logFilename
inputs.label: Log Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, file name for log. defaulted to 'output/processMigrator.log'

inputs.name: overwritePicklist
inputs.label: Overwrite Picklist(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default to 'false'. Set as true to overwrite picklist if exists on target or import will fail when picklist entries varies across source and target.

inputs.name: continueOnRuleImportFailure
inputs.label: Continue On Rule Import Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default to 'false', set true to continue import on failure importing rules, warning will be provided. If identities used in field default value or rules are not available in target account, import WILL fail. For rules you may use 'continueOnRuleImportFailure' option to proceed with rest of import when such error is occurred.

inputs.name: continueOnFieldDefaultValueFailure
inputs.label: Continue On Field Default Value Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default to 'false', set true to continue import on failure importing defaults, warning will be provided. If identities used in field default value or rules are not available in target account, import WILL fail. For identity field default value, you may use 'continueOnFieldDefaultValueFailure' option to proceed with rest of import when such error is occurred.

inputs.name: skipImportFormContributions
inputs.label: Skip Import Form Contributions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default to 'false', set true to skip import control contributions on work item form. If extensions used by source account are not available in target account, import MAY fail. Control/Group/Page contributions on work item form are by default imported, so it will fail if the extension is not available on target account. Use 'skipImportFormContributions' option to skip importing custom controls.
